item.title: Circles.Life introduces a range of new services centered around unlimited usage
item.description: For S$3, enjoy unlimited on-demand data at 4G+ speeds. For the first time, get unlimited WhatsApp roaming in 18 countries for S$1 per day. Source: Circles.Life. Poster for Unlimited Data on Demand.Â Circles.Life, Singapore’s fourth mobile operator, argues that the current unlimited data plans are actually quite restrictive. They believe that these plans should not be limited to weekends, slowed down after a small data limit, or tied to yearly contracts.
